column4: hi, I've tried to set up my site with dyndns and it has been working, but every time I reboot, ufw seems to reset itself... anyone know why?
also I just told it to open port 80 and I can't reach it even just via the IP from outside.
how can I check what is actually open on my box? maybe another firewall program is interfering...
maybe some usefull infos there for you
